title: 128.11.0esr Search message window too big for laptop screen
content: I can't seem to get the search message window to shrink down with the right click commands, nor with the arrows at the edges of the window, this has been going on since the beginning of 128 . . .
creator: lcapelis

title: New computer
content: Hello. I have not saved my adress books and mails in Thunderbird on my previous PC. (WIN10) Now I have a new PC which is running by WIN 11 and have installed Thunderbird. Unfortunately it seems that all my data is lost. Is there a way to rescue them? Thanks for your help Ralf
creator: rasograph58
